name: Drizzle ORM Setup
description: Drizzle ORM setup for Next.js with PostgreSQL. Type-safe SQL queries with excellent TypeScript support.

usage.installation: pnpm add drizzle-orm @neondatabase/serverless && pnpm add -D drizzle-kit
usage.configuration:
1. Add DATABASE_URL to .env
2. Define schema in src/db/schema.ts
3. Run: npx drizzle-kit push
